label: What is the minimum file size that I can store on S3?

choices.value: It allows a direct MPLS connection in to AWS.
It allows large scale import/exports in to the AWS cloud without the use of an internet connection.
It is a virtual appliance that can be used to cache S3 locally at a customer's site.

label: You need to use an Object based storage solution to store your critical, non-replaceable data in a cost effective way. This data will be frequently updated and will need some form of version control enabled on it. Which S3 storage solution should you use?
S3 has eventual consistency for which HTTP Methods?

choices.value: PUTS of new Objects and DELETES
PUTS of new objects and UPDATES

label: You have uploaded a file to S3. Which HTTP code would indicate that the upload was successful?
